author: Darnell Holguin
description: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.*Special ingredient #1: Passionfruit condensed milk – made by combining 355ml of passionfruit puree, 355ml of granulated sugar and 240ml Carnation evaporated milk.
name: It Was All A Dream

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
<strong>*Special ingredient #1<strong>: Passionfruit condensed milk – made by combining 355ml of passionfruit puree, 355ml of granulated sugar and 240ml Carnation evaporated milk
